summary: Tamagotchi is a popular Japanese toy that lets you take care of a digital pet. It was created in 1996 and became a huge trend in the late 1990s and early 2000s. The name comes from the Japanese words for "egg" and "watch." These toys are small, egg-shaped devices with buttons to interact with your pet. Over 91 million Tamagotchis have been sold worldwide.
title: Tamagotchi
